captions.text: [SHINee] Hello, we are shining SHINee!

[JONG HYUN] Why are we gathered here?
On YouTube, many people watched our music video
[KEY] Thank you!
[JONG HYUN] Because we are so thankful, we are gathered here to show our dance video in a closer and more unique way.
[MIN HO] Yay! Give a round of applause.
[JONG HYUN] We will be presenting the choreography's main points, from beginning to end,
in detail, ([KEY] No way) in our practice room, ([KEY] Oh, really?!) we will show it all. ([KEY] Oh, my~!) Let's talk about each dance point.
[TAE MIN] For me, when we start in the intro, starting from Key, we start dancing one by one, and at the end, you lift me up.
In the beginning, I was worried I would get hurt, but the more we tried it, it was fun and the most memorable.
[JONG HYUN] It has impact.
[TAE MIN] Truthfully, I think the members have to work harder than me.
[JONG HYUN] TAE MIN just has to lie down.
While we throw TAE MIN into the air and lift ourselves up, we think about our own TAE MIN.

[ONEW] There is another choreography point. 
[MIN HO] What is it?
[ONEW] I, ONEW, am in charge of the 'propeller' move.

[JONG HYUN] Is everyone talking about his own part 
as main point now?/ [ONEW] Yes, of course.

[MIN HO] Is your shoulder okay?
[ONEW] Yes, my shoulder is okay.

While I do the 'propeller' move, on this video,
you may not be able to see my arms.

[JONG HYUN] Because your arms are too fast. Really fast.
If you look at a helicopter, you can't see the wings well.
[KEY] While you do it, it seems like your arms might fly.

[ONEW] My arms flew off once.
[JONG HYUN] I saw that.

[ONEW] I picked it up and put it back on.
[JONG HYUN] Oh, really? I saw it, I saw it.

[MIN HO] Really?
[JONG HYUN] Really, the arms flew off.

[MIN HO] JONG HYUN, do you have anything?
[JONG HYUN] In my case, I think...
My face is the main point of the dance.

[ONEW] Of course, JONG HYUN is our face?!
[JONG HYUN] My face.. what?
[MIN HO] Now, to pay back your support, we will reveal our dance practice, so please look forward to it. We will present it to you now.

[TAE MIN] We will show it now!
[MIN HO] Let's go.
